Package imagefuzzygraph.algorithm

Class FuzzyGraphMatching

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    Class to perform a fuzzy graph matching.
    Author:
    Néstor Rodríguez Vico (nrv23@correo.ugr.es).

    • Method Detail

      • computeSimilarities

        public Map<String,​Map<String,​Double>> computeSimilarities​(ArrayList<Node> sourceNodes,
                                                                      ArrayList<Node> queryNodes)
        Compute a matrix representing the similarity between two nodes.
        Parameters:
        sourceNodes - source nodes.
        queryNodes - query nodes.
        Returns:
        matrix where, for row i and column j we have the similarity between sourceNodes[i] and queryNodes[j]. To handle deletion of nodes, a nested HashMap indexed by node identifiers is used instead of a matrix.

      • fuzzyEdgeInclusionConsideringNodes

        public double fuzzyEdgeInclusionConsideringNodes​(Edge source,
                                                 Edge query,
                                                 Map<String,​Map<String,​Double>> similarities)
        Compute the inclusion degree of the source edge in the query edge considering the nodes similarity.
        Parameters:
        source - source edge.
        query - query edge.
        similarities - similarities of the nodes.
        Returns:
        the inclusion degree of the source edge in the query edge.

      • greedyInclusion

        public double greedyInclusion​(Graph source,
                              Graph query)
        Compute the inclusion degree of the graph query in the graph source.
        Parameters:
        source - source graph.
        query - query graph.
        Returns:
        the inclusion degree of the graph query in the graph source.

      • greedyInclusion

        public double greedyInclusion​(Graph source,
                              Graph query,
                              AggregationOperator aggregationOperator)
        Compute the inclusion degree of the graph query in the graph source.
        Parameters:
        source - source graph.
        query - query graph.
        aggregationOperator - an AggregationOperator.
        Returns:
        the inclusion degree of the graph query in the graph source.

      • greedyMatching

        public Tuple<ListOfMatches,​ListOfMatches> greedyMatching​(Graph source,
                                                               Graph query)
        Find a matching between the source graph and the query graph.
        Parameters:
        source - source graph.
        query - query graph.
        Returns:
        tuple containing nodes matches and edge matches.

      • greedyMatching

        public Tuple<ListOfMatches,​ListOfMatches> greedyMatching​(Graph source,

        Find a matching between the source graph and the query graph.
        Parameters:

        similarities - similarities of the nodes.
        Returns:
        tuple containing nodes matches and edge matches.
